metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6865 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: `EncryptingOutputStream` was susceptible to exposing uninitialized data.This issue could only be abused in order to write data to a local diskwhich may have implications for private browsing mode. This vulnerabilityaffects Firefox ESR < 115.6 and Firefox < 121.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
